mapper.select: SELECT goalIdx, userIdx, title, description, type, day, startDate, endDate FROM goals WHERE userIdx = #{userIdx}
SELECT * FROM goals WHERE userIdx = #{userIdx} AND goalIdx = #{goalIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goals (userIdx, title, description, type, day, startDate, endDate) VALUES (#{userIdx}, #{title}, #{description}, #{type}, #{day}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
